策略: 测试gpt-退耕政策不仅是环境保护的手段，更是农业转型升级的契机。通过生态恢复、低碳农业、产业调整的综合策略，可以有效应对碳排放危机，实现人与自然的和谐共生。

The concept of "Yaji," translated as "elegant gathering," epitomizes the traditional Chinese art of connoisseurship through social gatherings. Yaji involves the assembly of literati—scholars and artists—within private gardens where art, poetry, and nature are collectively appreciated. This interaction is markedly participatory and intimate, facilitating not merely the observation but also the direct engagement with artworks.
